value:
$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Pain|It's...no use... I can't hold on...
any longer!$k$pI am sorry, my sister... I made it...
as long as I could.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Heið!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face|Seið! You...came for me.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|I am glad to see you safe. Please,
stay with me now—I will see that
you remain safe!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Smile|...Seið!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, Heið, I was so worried...
If anything were to happen to
you, I don't know what I'd do.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'm so glad we were able to
make it here in time!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I...um...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is it, Seiðr?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Forgive me, children of Midgard.
I am sorry to expose you to my
unbefitting moment of weakness.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Unbefitting?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|To display my confusion and
delight so wantonly...$k$pIt is not proper behavior for a
goddess of Vanaheimr...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What? The two of you seem so
close—it seemed only natural
you would feel like that, but...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Natural for a mortal perhaps.
However, as goddesses, we must
be above such things.$k$pKing Njörðr is certain to chide
my impropriety.$k$pWe are not like you, child of Midgard.
We must stay true to the noble air
of light goddesses.$k$pThat is what we are taught.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face|Seið... You have yet to introduce
me to this entourage that has
joined you.$k$pAnd you must tell me more about
this $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-Heiðr! Now is not the time.
We must act like the proper
goddesses we are...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, $Nu is just
over here!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Blush|Ah... So you are my sister's destined,
are you? I see.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|Wh-what are you implying, Heiðr?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Smile|Well, this is the one to whom
you gave your revelation, is it
not, Seið?$k$p$EFace|Giving a gift of revelation to a mortal
is no small matter for a goddess!$k$p$EFace_Blush|To do so is to thoroughly entwine
yourself in their destiny.$k$p$EFace_Blush2|Ohh! I don't want to embarrass
Seiðr any more than I have already.
Still...how exciting!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|N-no, it's not like that! I only
wanted to save their world, and...
well...ahem.$k$pThat is quite enough. We can discuss
this later. Right now we need to get
you back to King Njörðr, Heiðr.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Smile|Hee hee... As you wish, Seið.$k$p$EFace_Pain|...Hrg!$k$p$Sbs5000|$Fo1000,255,0,0,150|$Fi1500|$EFace_Pain2|Gyaaahhh!$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1000,255,0,0,150|$Fi1500|$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_12,0|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heið! Is it...the curse again?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Pain2|I am sorry, Seið... The serpents...$k$p$EFace_Cry|The serpents...writhe within me!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hold on for me, Heið... I will get you
taken care of!$k$pAs long as we can make it back
to King Njörðr, he can make it
better, just like before.$k$pJust...stay with me, Heiðr!$k$p$WmMPID_ヘイズ,ch00_49_Heith_Normal,Face_Cry|S-Sister...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's lost consciousness. We must
return her to King Njörðr right away.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What's happening to her?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Is she...sick?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It is the Golden Seer's curse. That is
how King Njörðr referred to it.$k$pThe curse of that sorceress,
Gullveig...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Gullveig, hm?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is it, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You saw Gullveig in the future
revealed to you, didn't you,
$Nu?$k$pIn your vision, do you remember
any snakes?$k$pIs it...possible that... No, no, never
mind—we must hurry.$k$p$Sbs150|
